alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:28AM EDT until April 09 at 9:43AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Burtonsville. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, water reaches Priddle Camp Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 7.2 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.2 feet on 03/06/1979. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Burtonsville Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 pm: 4.1 Forecast: Fri 2 pm 6.7 Fri 8 pm 6.6 Sat 2 am 6.2 Sat 8 am 5.5 Sat 2 pm 4.8 Sat 8 pm 4.3 Sun 2 am 4.1 Sun 8 am 3.8 Sun 2 pm 3.6 Sun 8 pm 3.4 &&
